languages.text: "Честно говоря, из всей твоей речи я понял{mf||а} только то, что ты не хочешь драться. Разделяю это желание".
"To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."
languages.original_text: "Честно говоря, из всей твоей речи я понял{mf||а} только то, что ты не хочешь драться. Разделяю это желание".

traits.locale_text: "To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."
"To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."
"To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."
"To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."

languages.text: “老实说，我唯一能理解你的部分，就是你并不打算和我开战。在这一点上，我与你一样。”
languages.original_text: "To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，我唯一能理解你的部分，就是你并不打算和我开战。在这一点上，我与你一样。”

languages.text: «Sinceramente, lo único que he entendido es que no buscas pelea. En eso estamos de acuerdo».
languages.original_text: "To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."

traits.locale_text: «Sinceramente, lo único que he entendido es que no buscas pelea. En eso estamos de acuerdo».

languages.text: 「正直に言おう、お前に戦闘の意思がないことだけは理解した。その点はこちらも同じだ」
languages.original_text: "To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."

traits.locale_text: 「正直に言おう、お前に戦闘の意思がないことだけは理解した。その点はこちらも同じだ」

languages.text: "Offen gestanden, ich habe lediglich begriffen, dass Ihr keinen Kampf wünscht. Und das haben wir gemeinsam."
languages.original_text: "To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."

traits.locale_text: "Offen gestanden, ich habe lediglich begriffen, dass Ihr keinen Kampf wünscht. Und das haben wir gemeinsam."

languages.text: « Franchement, tout ce que j'ai compris, c'est que vous ne souhaitez pas vous battre. Ça nous fait un point commun. »
languages.original_text: "To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."

traits.locale_text: « Franchement, tout ce que j'ai compris, c'est que vous ne souhaitez pas vous battre. Ça nous fait un point commun. »

languages.text: "Doğrusunu istersen anladığım tek şey, savaşma arzusunda olmadığın. Bu konuda hemfikiriz."
languages.original_text: "To be honest, the only part I understood was that you have no desire to fight. That is one thing we have in common."

traits.locale_text: "Doğrusunu istersen anladığım tek şey, savaşma arzusunda olmadığın. Bu konuda hemfikiriz."
